metadata.title: Free Image to Black and White Converter - MakeBW.com
metadata.description: Instantly make any image black and white with MakeBW. The best free online converter for grayscale, line art, and coloring pages. No upload needed, 100% private.
metadata.keywords: make image black and white, image to black and white converter, convert photo to grayscale, turn picture into coloring page
metadata.format_title: Convert {format} to Black and White - Free Tool
metadata.format_desc: Free {format} to black and white converter. Instant conversion, no upload, completely private. Perfect for printing and coloring pages.

hero.title: Convert Images to
hero.subtitle: Transform your photos instantly with our free, browser-based tool. No upload, no server, complete privacy. Perfect for printing, art, and coloring pages.

uploader.title: Upload Your Image
uploader.drop_zone: Drag & drop your image here, or click to browse
uploader.error_invalid: Invalid file type. Please upload an image.
uploader.error_size: File too large. Maximum size is 10MB.

features.title: Why Choose MakeBW?
features.subtitle: Professional image processing with complete privacy and zero cost.
features.feature_1_desc: All processing happens in your browser. Your images never leave your device.
features.feature_2_desc: Real-time conversion with adjustable parameters. See results immediately.
features.feature_3_desc: Grayscale, line art for coloring, or color inversion. Perfect for any use case.
features.feature_4_desc: No subscriptions, no credits, no limits. Professional tools, free forever.
features.feature_5_desc: Desktop, tablet, or mobile. Modern browsers supported.
features.feature_6_desc: Save ink with optimized grayscale. Perfect for home and office printing.

pages.color_to_bw_title: Convert Color Photos to Black and White
pages.color_to_bw_desc: Remove color from your photos to create classic black and white images. Perfect for printing documents, saving printer ink (up to 60% savings), or creating timeless photo effects.
pages.coloring_desc: Transform any photo into a coloring page with our line art generator. Parents and teachers love it for creating custom coloring activities for kids.
pages.invert_desc: Create negative images by inverting all colors. Useful for special effects, design projects, and artistic expression.

formats.jpg_intro: JPG (or JPEG) is one of the most widely used image formats. Our converter maintains image quality while removing color information, perfect for photos and complex images.
formats.jpg_feature_1: Most compatible format across all devices
formats.jpg_feature_2: Best for photographs and detailed images
formats.png_intro: PNG format supports transparency and lossless compression. When converting PNG to black and white, you can choose to preserve or remove transparency.
formats.png_feature_3: Perfect for logos and graphics with transparency
formats.webp_intro: WebP is a modern image format that provides superior compression. Converting WebP to black and white reduces file size even further.
formats.webp_feature_3: Smaller file sizes than JPG or PNG
formats.heic_intro: HEIC is Apple's efficient image format used by default on iPhones. Our tool automatically converts HEIC files for processing.
formats.heic_feature_1: Default format on iPhone and iPad

footer.tagline: Free, fast, and private image processing
